item.dc:creator: admin

All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)



【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. A must-have for daily training and playing.
【Adjustable Length & 7 Doorbells】Unlike other puppies supplies on the market, this durable go outside dog bell has a 3-snap design so that the length can be adjusted easily according to your training needs. The 7 bells can make a loud sound to let you notice the dog’s needs and solve them in time.
【Wide Application】With top-quality material, superior craftsmanship, and humane design, these pet training bells are suitable for small, medium, large dogs, or even cats! It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family who love pets and want to train them well.
【What Can You Get】The package comes with 1 x Doggy Train Doorbells. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these puppy accessories and provide a 30-day money-back warranty and 24-house online customer service for all people. What are you waiting for? It’s Time to Do Some Training!

4.5
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)

item.title: The Original Doggy Bag™ by Rubyloo-Dog Travel Bag for Supplies with 2 BPA-Free Travel Dog Bowls, 2 Dog Food Travel Containers-A Dog Travel Kit for Road Trips or Weekend Away. Airline Approved
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we’ve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Bag Dimensions
15″ x 13″ x 7″ 17″ x 11″ x 6″

Bowl Diameter
7″ 5″

Food Container Capacity
16 cups (8 cups each) 12 cups

Placemat
16″ x 12″

Poop Bag Dispenser

✓

✓

Water Resistant Fabric

✓

✓

Removable Divider

✓

✓

Luggage Handle Sleeve

✓

✓

Lined Treat Bag

✓

Removable Shoulder Strap

✓

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15 x 7 x 13 inches; 2.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 17, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ rubyloo
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B087N9J3DX
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Dog Diaper Bag, Anyone? As dog owners, we know what really makes life with dogs easier. We added the poop bag dispenser to the puppy travel bag so you never end up in a ‘stinky’ situation again! Our travel dog bag set is a great idea for dog mom, dog dad, and pet lover gifts!
Do You Want A Clean And Organized Car? Our removable divider and multiple pockets keep your and your dog’s essentials organized for your next beach, hiking, or overnight road trip! All your dog camping gear and travel supplies in one dog travel bag – always good to go. Our dog bags for traveling are airline-approved and feature a handy suitcase sleeve.
Good Dogs Deserve Great Gear! With premium padded straps for comfort and generous storage for dog travel accessories, you can carry the comforts of home on the go. Trust our commitment to quality with our portable dog food travel bags with high-quality zippers & water-resistant fabric. A sustainable substitute for plastic bags!
100% Lifetime Manufacturer Guarantee. At Rubyloo (Formerly Lucky Tail), it’s our mission to reinvent dog products to make your life better together. We’re a US-based company that provides innovation and quality you can trust. With our ‘Every Dog Should Have A Home’ initiative, your purchase will help a rescue find their forever home.

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we’ve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Read more

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.




Dog Travel Bag for Supplies
Backpack for Dog Supplies

Bowl Diameter 7″ 5″

Size Information: it comes in 4 sizes and fits into most pet crates and sizes for your choice; There are: small (60 x 40 cm/ 23.6 x 15.7 inches), medium (76 x 52 cm/ 30 x 20.5 inches), large (104 x 76 cm/ 40.9 x 30 inches), x-small (25 x 25 cm/ 9.84 x 9.84 inches), x-large (100 x 160 cm/ 39.37 x 62.99 inches) giving your pet a greater sense of security; Please confirm the size before purchasing,It is recommended to shoot a larger size product.
Wide Range of Application: the cute dog blankets could be widely applied for most pets like hamster, guinea, pig, dog, cat, chinchilla, hedgehog or other animals in every season and many situations as afternoon napping or taking shower; They can be placed in the couch, pet bed, inside your car, or travel outside, you can also put them on the floor
Guard Furniture and PET Bed: the puppy blanket can prevent your furniture or pet bed from being scratched, clawed or bitten by your pets, at the same time, it can keep the home clean and tidy, hairless; Cute printed patterns, soft and warm material, reliable and well absorbent, your puppy may love this cute and soft blanket, it is a nice gift for your puppies to play, lay and nap
Soft and Washable: the puppy blankets are well made of coral velvet fabric, which is soft and comfy to touch, provding your furry baby with fuzzy cozy experience; They are washable and reusable, not easy to fade and shed, which can serve your pets for a long time

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Dog Poop Bags for Waste Refuse Cleanup, Doggy Roll Replacements for Outdoor Puppy Walking and Travel, Leak Proof and Tear Resistant, Thick Plastic
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break? Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash? Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags! We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $6.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:11:38 UTC – Details)


HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND

Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break?

Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash?

Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags!

We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags made using a
special ingredient. The secret behind this smart technology? A certified additive known as d2w.
It shortens the life of our bags at the end of its useful life when it ends up in the open
environment.

So you get to throw your pet’s waste without destroying the environment.

Here are more reasons you’ll love these strong poop bags:

  • – Made with 15 microns-thick plastic for greater strength.
  • – Well-sealed seams prevent the bags from ripping.

– The opaque design masks the contents of the bags.- Scented with a jasmine fragrance that keeps odor at bay.- Very easy to separate from the roll thanks to high-quality perforations.- Sized at 13” (L) x 9” (H) to handle poop from all breeds.- They leave you enough room at the top to create a knot.- Backed by a 100.

Go ahead, get heavy-duty biodegradable poop bags that you can toss guilt-free!
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.14 x 1.57 x 0.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ MX-150B
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 7, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07W4M599X
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

MAKING PLASTIC SMARTER: Unlike other pet waste bags that harm the environment, ours lasts much shorter time if it gets into the open environment due to presence of d2w additive.
MASK THE MESS: No more cringing in disgust. Opaque, scented, and beautifully designed, these doggie bags for poop make picking up after your four-legged pal less of a nightmare.
EASY TO SEPARATE AND OPEN: High-quality perforations make separating the biodegradable poop bags a breeze. So you get to clear the mess much faster.
SIZED JUST RIGHT: Measuring 13” (L) x 9” (H), the pet poop bags are large enough to handle the largest of deposits. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now and start picking up your pup’s poop with confidence!

Read more

Lightly Scented

Our doggie poop bags are lightly scented to help mask those smelly odors. This is especially important if you need to walk some distance before you find a trash can or have to keep it in the car until you get home.

Fun Colors & Patterns

Who said poop bags have to be totally gross? We offer doggie poop bags in a variety of pet and owner-friendly colors including pink hearts, cute paws, bones and much more!

Thicker & Resilient Bags

Standard poop bags often tear or leak, especially if you have a larger dog. We’ve made our plastic bags 15 microns thick to withstand those late-night poop walks, dog park excited poops and all the other messy situations a pet owner winds up in.

Easy-Tear Perforations

Every bag is cleanly perforated and easy to tear off from the roll. The opaque design masks the contents of the bags. Try our dog waste bag dispensers to keep them on hand when it is needed!

Read more

Pet Wipes
Puppy Training Pads
